Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its unique features and high-quality materials, this product stands out in its category. I believe it could greatly enhance your experience and productivity. For a limited time, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $75. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your life with our exceptional product! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
